verbs.description: The more [ARG0: the Press] [V: runs] [ARG1: Eugene Robinson 's anti - Trump columns] , the more glaringly apparent it becomes that there is a twisted agenda between the two .
[ARGM-ADV: The more the Press runs Eugene Robinson 's anti - Trump columns] , [ARG2: the more glaringly apparent] it [V: becomes] [ARG1: that there is a twisted agenda between the two] .
The more the Press runs Eugene Robinson 's anti - Trump columns , the more glaringly apparent it becomes that there [V: is] [ARG1: a twisted agenda between the two] .
